__data__.text: This is Crowd Agent at 2025年02月13日（星期四）09:30 Plan：Wake up at 6；Move to CHIJMES plazas at 7:00；Wait orderly according to guidance at 8:00；Observe crowd density and adjust position at 9:00；Continue moving and waiting as per event flow at 10:00；Take a short break in a suitable spot at 11:30；Follow on-site guidance for movement at 12:00；Adjust position based on congestion at 13:00；Remain in place for event activities at 14:00；Move to a new suitable spot at 15:30；Continue observing and adjusting position at 16:00；Stay in place for evening event at 17:00；Move to a final suitable spot at 18:00；Wait orderly for event conclusion at 19:00；Return to a safe position for the evening at 20:00
